altername_name: Disney-Pixar Toy Story 2: Buzz Lightyear to the Rescue!
Disney-Pixar Toy Story 2: Buzz Lightyear eilt zur Hilfe!
Disney-Pixar Toy Story 2: Buzz L'Eclair a la Rescousse
name: Toy Story 2: Buzz Lightyear to the Rescue!
overview: The Countdown to Adventure is On! As space hero Buzz Lightyear, you've got your hands full. Your best buddy, Woody, has been kidnapped by a greedy toy collector and it's going to be an all-out race against time to save him. It's all up to you... Buzz Lightyear to the rescue! Spin, spring, somersault and bounce through 15 colorful, action-packed levels. Unlock special toy accessories to complete your missions like cool rocket jet boots! Enjoy fast and fun 3D gameplay with your favorite characters from the movie!
